customer_name: This Is The Place Heritage Park
customer_addr:
2601 East Sunnyside Ave.
Salt Lake City, UT 84108
site_name: THIS IS THE PLACE HERITAGE PARK

citations.narrative:
** The facility has two dogs housed in one enclosure, the enclosures wooden walls are not impervious to moisture.
The wood that the dogs could come into contact with must be made impervious to moisture to allow for proper
cleaning and sanitizing and to reduce odors and disease hazards. All surfaces in contact with the animals must be
impervious to moisture. To be corrected by: 05-11-16.

** The facility did not have a written exercise plan for dogs approved by the attending veterinarian. The facility must
establish a written exercise plan for dogs and have it approved by the attending veterinarian. All exhibitors with dogs
must have a written exercise plan approved by the attending veterinarian to provide for the health and well-being of
the animals. To be corrected by: 05-11-16.
This inspection and exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
End of report.

narrative:
3.3(e)(1)(3)
SHELTERED HOUSING FACILITIES.
** The facility has two dogs housed in one enclosure, the enclosures wooden walls are not impervious to moisture.
The wood that the dogs could come into contact with must be made impervious to moisture to allow for proper
cleaning and sanitizing and to reduce odors and disease hazards. All surfaces in contact with the animals must be
impervious to moisture. To be corrected by: 05-11-16.
3.8
EXERCISE FOR DOGS.
** The facility did not have a written exercise plan for dogs approved by the attending veterinarian. The facility must
establish a written exercise plan for dogs and have it approved by the attending veterinarian. All exhibitors with dogs
must have a written exercise plan approved by the attending veterinarian to provide for the health and well-being of
the animals. To be corrected by: 05-11-16.
This inspection and exit briefing conducted with facility representative.
End of report.
